name: The Windigo's Cave
description:
The Windigo's Cave is a roguelike game realized for the Ludum Dare 35 (Shapeshift). 

It was never posted on the LDJAM site because we haven't finished the game in time.

Gameplay

You play as a young native american that passes his rite of initiation to learn how control of his power.

To get there you need to recover the 3 relics of the cave.

These relics give the power to transform into animals to use their forces.

But beware these relics are jealously guarded by the Windigo and its sbires.

Be careful with the Zombis, the Cow-boys ghost and the Nihasa who with his kisses will paralyze you ...

Credits

Graphics : Lucia Alves

Programming : Bady Mebarki
